name: antelope-abi2rs
description: Generates Rust type defenitions from Antelope ABI files
author: Yaro Shkvorets

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && sed -i '' '1s/ts-node/node/' dist/cli.js && chmod +x dist/cli.js && rm dist/cli.d.ts && VERSION="$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && echo "module.exports = '$VERSION';" > dist/version.js
